snippet.title: A Giant Problem Steam Early Access Announcement Trailer | VR
snippet.description:
A Giant Problem is a VR action game that is slated to come out for the HTC Vive family of headsets, Oculus Rift & Rift S, and the Valve Index. It is releasing on Steam Early Access on April 1, 2020.

Wishlist A Giant Problem Today! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1020120/A_Giant_Problem/

Smash, bash and mash away your enemies as a giant set on defending a village under siege. Command troops, sling magic, rebuild your defenses - anything you can get your hands on could be a weapon!
